## IAuthenticationClient.term() method

Finalizes the authentication handshake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
term(handle: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | <code>number</code> | an authentication handle to close. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
